did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia
1988-1989

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Accession #RG-2/1/2.911, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred on 1991 August 26.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by Robert O'Neil, the President of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.

The papers consist of: general files, 1988-1989; seldom used permanent files, 1980-1991; ad hoc committee files, 1982-1991; administrative committees, 1980-1989; and, Robert O'Neil's speeches files, 1987-1989.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: General Files, 1988-1989 Boxes 1-54
Series II: Seldom Used Permanent Files, 1980-1991 Boxes 55-59
Series III: Ad Hoc Committees Files, 1982-1991 Boxes 59-60
Series IV: Administrative Committees Files, 1980-1989 Boxes 61-65
Series V: Robert O'Neil's Speech Files, 1985-1990 Boxes 66-71
Series VI: Restricted Materials, 1987-1989 Boxes 72-74
